snippet: E. Gordon Gee, who resigned as president of Ohio State University in July after a series of embarrassing gaffes, will serve as interim president of West Virginia University.
abstract: E Gordon Gee, who resigned as president of Ohio State University after a series of embarrassing gaffes, will serve as interim president of West Virginia University.
lead_paragraph: E. Gordon Gee, who resigned as president of Ohio State University in July after a series of embarrassing gaffes, will serve as interim president of West Virginia University.

headline.main: Former Ohio State President Returns to West Virginia
headline.print_headline: Former Ohio State President Returns to West Virginia
